name: KONTAINER535
description:
This is a rough prototype for a 2D-platformer, made in Godot.

You can't turn the player character, at least not with visual indication. This is a bug.

There is no walking. This is intentional.

There is a double jump, you trigger that one by pressing Space. (A on a Xbox Controller)

There is also a dash attack, which is executed by hitting "X" on a keyboard. (X on a Xbox controller)

There is no win state; don't even try.
